name: Ashwani-Kumar-Upadhyay
bio: Ashwani Kumar Upadhyay is a software engineer and educator, known for his role at the institute Code For Success, where he leads Java Full Stack and Spring Boot courses aimed at job-ready learners. He combines deep core Java & back-end fundamentals with placement-oriented teaching style.
teachingStyle: Beginner-friendly, concept-from-scratch with rich examples and doubt-clearing sessions
achievements: Instructor of multiple batches of Java Full Stack programmes at Code For Success
Recognised by students for breaking down complex topics clearly
Led dedicated placement-oriented Java training tracks
